root.api_para: a:5:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:10:"pay_status";s:5:"value";s:0:"";s:10:"directions";s:109:"付款状态 0:未支付;1:已支付;2:已付款至到担保方;3:部分付款;4:部分退款;5:全额退款;";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 0";s:4:"type";s:3:"Int";}i:1;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:11:"ship_status";s:5:"value";s:0:"";s:10:"directions";s:79:"发货状态 0:未发货;1:已发货;2:部分发货;3:部分退货;4:已退货;";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 0";s:4:"type";s:3:"Int";}i:2;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:6:"status";s:5:"value";s:0:"";s:10:"directions";s:32:"订单状态（finish=已完成)";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 0";s:4:"type";s:6:"String";}i:3;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:17:"createtime_status";s:5:"value";s:0:"";s:10:"directions";s:73:"订单时间(prior_to:一个月前的订单;recent:近一个月的订单)";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 0";s:4:"type";s:6:"String";}i:4;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:6:"n_page";s:5:"value";s:0:"";s:10:"directions";s:6:"页码";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 0";s:4:"type";s:6:"Number";}}
